item.title: Fairest, Volume 4: Of Men and Mice
item.description: Fairest, Volume 4: Of Men and Mice. In which one of the mice on that fateful night of glass slippers and dancing and pumpkin carriages … never turned back into a man. And fathered thousands of half mouse, half human (in various configurations) offspring, which are now coming back to ruin Fabletown’s lives.
